practice_phrases: We don't want to read
我们不想读
We don't want to be quiet
我们不想安静
We don't want to speak tonight
我们不想今晚说话
We don't want to interrupt the story
我们不想打断这个故事
We don't want to read anything this afternoon
我们不想今天下午读任何东西
We don't want to take too much time to answer
我们不想花太多时间回答
We don't want to be quiet when other people are here
我们不想当其他人在这里的时候安静
We don't want to show you anything when you are here tonight
我们不想今晚当你在这里的时候给你看任何东西
We don't want to be able to remember easily this afternoon
我们不想今天下午很容易就能记住
We don't want to start talking as soon as possible when other people are here
我们不想当其他人在这里的时候尽快开始说话
I wanted to interrupt
我想打断
He doesn't want to interrupt
他不想打断
She wanted to interrupt yesterday
她昨天想打断
We don't want to interrupt tonight
我们不想今晚打断
I look forward to not interrupting
我期待不打断
He doesn't want to interrupt the story this afternoon
他不想今天下午打断这个故事
She doesn't want to interrupt when other people are here
她不想当其他人在这里的时候打断
I wanted to interrupt when you wanted to speak with me yesterday
我昨天想当你想和我说话的时候打断
We don't want to interrupt anything when other people are here tonight
我们不想今晚当其他人在这里的时候打断任何东西
It's useful to not interrupt when other people are speaking as soon as you can
当其他人在说话的时候尽快不打断是有用的
I wanted to read the story
我想读这个故事
She doesn't want to interrupt the story
她不想打断这个故事
He wanted to read the story yesterday
他昨天想读这个故事
I look forward to reading the story tonight
我期待今晚读这个故事
We don't want to interrupt the story tonight
我们不想今晚打断这个故事
She doesn't want to read the story this afternoon
她不想今天下午读这个故事
He doesn't want to interrupt the story when other people are here
他不想当其他人在这里的时候打断这个故事
I wanted to ask you something about the story when you are here yesterday
我昨天想当你在这里的时候问你关于这个故事的一些事情
She doesn't want to take too much time to read the story this afternoon
